name: Don't Freeze
storyline: Set in a forest where the player must escape before going mad, Don’t Freeze is a survival game by Neonalig. The player must navigate the forest, find the river and craft a bridge to escape. But beware, the forest is cruel and the player must keep their vitalities in check: heat, thirst and hunger. The player can craft items by dropping them on each other and cutting items by hitting them with an axe. The player must also keep their temperature in check, stay hydrated by crafting empty cups and filling them with water at the river and escape before they starve. Will you be able to survive and escape the forest?
summary:
The spiritual… predecessor… to that one game about going hungry.
Can you escape the forest before you go mad?
Hey, I think this place looks familiar…
